QuestData.Title: Finding Beak
QuestData.Description: I lost me gryphon. Beak! Where are you Beak?!$B$BWanna help me find him? I know he's in da hovel. He hasta be.$B$BBeak?! Wheres are ya?$B$BI hope he's okay.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Donnelly find Beak in Dunwald Hovel.
QuestData.RewardText: You found'm! You found Beak! I like you, new friend!$B$BI'm gonna go show Keely. Keely like Beak too.

Objectives.Objective: Search the cellar in southern Dunwald Hovel
Search the cellar in northwestern Dunwald Hovel
Search the buildings in eastern Dunwald Hovel
